title: DeepSeek-R1: Reasoning via RL
prompt: RL pipeline for reasoning with rejection sampling
description: DeepSeek-R1 reasoning pipeline with reinforcement learning and rejection sampling mechanisms

diagrams.code:
title RL Pipeline for Reasoning with Rejection Sampling
direction right

// Nodes
Start environment [shape: oval, icon: globe, color: lightblue]
Start policy initialization [shape: oval, icon: play, color: lightblue]
Initialize reward model [shape: rectangle, icon: shield, color: lightblue]
Generate candidate trajectories [shape: rectangle, icon: cpu, color: orange]
Evaluate trajectories [shape: rectangle, icon: bar-chart-2, color: orange]
Accept trajectory decision [shape: diamond, icon: check-circle, color: orange]
Add to accepted set [shape: rectangle, icon: inbox, color: lightgreen]
Reject trajectory [shape: rectangle, icon: x-circle, color: lightcoral]
Sample count sufficient? [shape: diamond, icon: bar-chart-2, color: orange]
Policy Update [color: lightgreen, icon: refresh-ccw] {
  Update policy parameters [shape: rectangle, icon: refresh-ccw, color: lightgreen]
  Reset accepted samples [shape: rectangle, icon: refresh-ccw, color: lightgreen]
}
Evaluate performance [shape: rectangle, icon: activity, color: lightblue]
Performance adequate? [shape: diamond, icon: check-circle, color: lightblue]
End process [shape: oval, icon: flag, color: lightgreen]

// Relationships
Start environment > Initialize reward model
Start policy initialization > Initialize reward model
Initialize reward model > Generate candidate trajectories
Generate candidate trajectories > Evaluate trajectories
Evaluate trajectories > Accept trajectory decision
Accept trajectory decision > Add to accepted set: Yes
Accept trajectory decision > Reject trajectory: No
Add to accepted set > Sample count sufficient?: Yes
Sample count sufficient? > Policy Update: Yes
Policy Update > Evaluate performance
Evaluate performance > Performance adequate?
Performance adequate? > End process: Yes
Generate candidate trajectories < Add to accepted set: No
Generate candidate trajectories < Reject trajectory
Generate candidate trajectories < Sample count sufficient?: No
Generate candidate trajectories < Performance adequate?: No
